name: i-librarian
description: I Librarian is a web based reference and document manager for researchers. It stores PDFs, annotations and bibliographic data, supports full text search and citation export, and can be deployed as a private literature database.
features: PDF Management: Store and organize research papers and documents in a centralized library.
Annotation Tools: Highlight and annotate PDFs directly within the web interface.
Full-Text Search: Search through document content, titles, and metadata instantly.
Citation Export: Export bibliographic data in BibTeX, RIS, and other citation formats.
Metadata Extraction: Automatically extract and organize bibliographic information from PDFs.
Tagging System: Categorize documents with custom tags for easy organization.
Project Organization: Group related papers into projects for research workflows.
Private Database: Self-hosted solution for complete control over your research library.
